00044 template <class DNode>
00045 class GDList
00046 {
00047   friend class GDListCursor<DNode>;
00048   friend class GDListConstCursor<DNode>;
00049   friend class GBPQueue<DNode>;
00050   friend class GBPQueue2<DNode>;
00051 
00052 public:
00054   GDList() : _head(nil()), _tail(_head) {}
00055  
00057   bool isEmpty() const { return _head == nil(); }
00058 
00060   void clear() { _head = _tail = nil(); }
00061 
00063   DNode& first() { assert(!isEmpty()); return *_head; }
00064 
00066   DNode& last() { assert(!isEmpty()); return *_tail; }
00067 
00069   const DNode& first() const { assert(!isEmpty()); return *_head; }
00070 
00072   const DNode& last() const { assert(!isEmpty()); return *_tail; }
00073 
00075   static void detach(DNode& ptr)
00076   {
00077     DNode* const n = ptr._next;
00078     DNode* const p = ptr._prev;
00079     assert(n != 0 && n->_prev == &ptr);
00080     assert(p != 0 && p->_next == &ptr);
00081     p->_next = n;
00082     n->_prev = p;
00083   }
00084 
00087   void pushFront(DNode& ptr) 
00088   {
00089     ptr._next = _head;
00090     _head->_prev = &ptr;
00091     _head = &ptr;
00092     ptr._prev = nil();
00093   }  
00094 
00097   void pushBack(DNode& ptr) 
00098   {
00099     ptr._prev = _tail;
00100     _tail->_next = &ptr;
00101     _tail = &ptr;
00102     ptr._next = nil();
00103   }  
00104 
00107   void pushRandom(DNode& ptr)
00108   {
00109     if (rand() & 1 == 0) pushBack(ptr);
00110     else pushFront(ptr);
00111   }
00112 
00115   DNode& popFront()
00116   {
00117     assert(!isEmpty());
00118     DNode* res = _head;
00119     _head = res->_next;
00120     _head->_prev = nil();
00121     return *res;        
00122   }
00123 
00126   DNode& popBack()
00127   {
00128     assert(!isEmpty());
00129     DNode* res = _tail;
00130     _tail = res->_prev;
00131     _tail->_next = nil();
00132     return *res;        
00133   }
00134 
00137   void popFrontFast()
00138   {
00139     assert(!isEmpty());
00140     _head = _head->_next;
00141     _head->_prev = nil(); 
00142   }
00143 
00146   void popBackFast()
00147   {
00148     assert(!isEmpty());
00149     _tail = _tail->_prev;
00150     _tail->_next = nil();       
00151   }
00152 
00155   void concat(GDList<DNode>& L)
00156   {
00157     if (L.isEmpty()) return;
00158     _tail->_next = L._head;
00159     L.first()._prev = _tail;
00160     L.last()._next = nil();
00161     _tail = L._tail;
00162     L.clear();
00163   }
00164 
00165 //xxx   /** @return true if list contains ptr. Take O(n) time. */
00166 //xxx   bool contains(DNode& ptr) const
00167 //xxx   {
00168 //xxx     const DNode* cur = nil();
00169 //xxx     while ((cur = cur->_next) != nil()) {
00170 //xxx       if (&ptr == cur) return true;
00171 //xxx     }
00172 //xxx     return false;
00173 //xxx   }
00174 
00176   bool isValid() const
00177   {
00178     const DNode* cur = nil();
00179     do {
00180       if (cur->_next->_prev != cur) return false;
00181       if (cur->_prev->_next != cur) return false;
00182       cur = cur->_next;
00183     } while (cur != nil());
00184     return true;
00185   }
00186 
00187 private:
00189   DNode* nil() { return reinterpret_cast<DNode*>(this); }
00190   const DNode* nil() const { return reinterpret_cast<const DNode*>(this); }
00192 
00195   void makeDummy() { _head = 0; }
00196 
00197   // Unimplemented (no way to implement these)
00198   GDList(const GDList<DNode>&);
00199   GDList<DNode>& operator=(const GDList<DNode>&);
00200 
00201 private:

00203   DNode* _tail;

00217 template <class DNode>
00218 class GDListCursor
00219 {
00220 private:
00221   DNode* _nil;   
00222   DNode* _cur;   
00224 public:
00226   GDListCursor() {}
00227 
00229   GDListCursor(GDList<DNode>& L) : 
00230     _nil(L.nil()), 
00231     _cur(_nil->_next) 
00232   {
00233   }
00234 
00236   void associate(GDList<DNode>& L) { _nil = L.nil(); reset(); }
00237 
00239   bool hasNext() const { return _cur != _nil; }
00240 
00242   void reset() { _cur = _nil->_next; }
00243  
00245   DNode& getNext() 
00246   { 
00247     assert(hasNext());
00248     DNode& res = *_cur;
00249     _cur = _cur->_next; 
00250     return res; 
00251   }
00252 };

00281   bool hasNext() const { return _cur != _nil; }

00284   void reset() { _cur = _nil->_next; }
